Articles.Content:
Hi All, perhaps this has been asked, I've searched and can't seem to find the answer. If so my apologies for the double post.

I've been completing a large amount of scientific probe runs to Mun. I believe I have completed all but one series of experiments in each of the biomes on Mun, but without traveling to each and checking, is there a more elegant way to review where I've exhausted my science value/per experiment/per biome?

Thanks,

LordZowy

Edited November 8, 2013 by LordZowy

I don't think you can at the moment. I'd love to as well. "Kerbal got some rocks, fell over, then did science!"

A mission control would be great for going over past missions too (with screenshots etc).
This plugin will do just that.
